comment.author: 13996462@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Kusakabe Kimbei Studio, and we'd love to have this added to the group! i'm trying to put together a full set of images of Kimbei's studio. i'm very interested that your album doesn't have the names in the corner. :) please feel free to add many too this group for all our research. thanks g
